Q_NAME: Postfix and prefix operator overloading using friend function
Q_DESC: Overload prefix and postfix operators using friend functions
TESTCASE_1:
Give static input1 input 2(eg.5,-5)
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Before prefix decrement a=5and b=-5
After prefix decrement a=4and b=-6
Before postfix decrement a=5and b=-5
After postfix decrement a=4and b=-6
